ingredients.ingredient: 1 small bunch fresh Italian parsley, stemmed and roughly chopped
1 pound fresh medium shrimp - shells on, rinsed, and patted dry
1 tablespoon seasoned salt (such as Lawry's®), or to taste

cookingTips: Soak bamboo skewers in water for at least 30 minutes before using to prevent burning
Pat shrimp dry before grilling to ensure better browning and caramelization
Melt garlic butter slowly and brush on shrimp during the last minute of cooking for maximum flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: I'm grilling shrimp and want an aromatic, buttery coating. How do I prevent garlic from burning while getting maximum flavor?
